group.title: Setting up a Slack webhook for simple notifications
group.author: Bradley Schoeneweis
group.excerpt: Setting up a Slack webhook to send plain text or simple HTML notifications to a Slack channel.

group.title: Forecasting SPY prices using Facebook's Prophet
group.author: Bradley Schoeneweis
group.excerpt: Using Facebook's Prophet, an open-source, time series forecasting procedure to predict SPY (SPDR S&P 500 ETF Trust) closing prices.

group.title: Converting HTML to a PDF using Python, AWS Lambda, and wkhtmltopdf
group.author: Bradley Schoeneweis
group.excerpt: Setting up usage of wkhtmltopdf with Python in an AWS Lambda function for easy HTML to PDF conversion.

group.title: Visualizing your LinkedIn Connections using Python
group.author: Bradley Schoeneweis
group.excerpt: Using Python's Pandas, NetworkX, and pyvis to understand and visualize companies within a directly connected LinkedIn network.
